## üõ† Tech Stack

Tired of endless note-taking during lectures or meetings?  Wish you could effortlessly capture every word spoken, without missing a beat? Then get ready to meet Notely Voice, a game-changing app that's about to transform how you work.  Notely Voice is a free, cross-platform application that uses the power of AI-driven voice transcription to turn spoken words into text instantly. Imagine this: you're in a lecture, effortlessly capturing everything the professor says, without even lifting a pen. Or, picture yourself in a meeting, having a detailed record of every decision and discussion point, ready for review later.  That's the magic of Notely Voice.  But it's not just about transcription; Notely Voice is a full-fledged note-taking application.  It allows you to format your notes, add headers and sub-headers, bold or italicize text, and even search your notes quickly.  You can organize your notes into folders and use tags for easy retrieval.  The app supports offline transcription, meaning you can use it anywhere, anytime, even without an internet connection. Notely Voice works seamlessly across Android and iOS, ensuring a consistent experience no matter which device you prefer.  It's built using Compose Multiplatform, a modern UI framework, guaranteeing a smooth and intuitive user experience.  The app offers rich text editing capabilities so you can format your notes with headers, bold text, and other formatting options. You can even filter your notes based on various criteria, making it easier to find what you need.  Beyond the core functionality, Notely Voice prioritizes privacy.  Your notes are yours, and yours alone. This is crucial in an era where data privacy is paramount.  The app's intuitive interface is easy to navigate, even for users who aren't tech-savvy.  It has a clean, modern design and is highly customizable.  The developers are actively working on adding new features and improving existing ones, based on user feedback.  For developers, Notely Voice is a fantastic example of how AI and cross-platform development can combine to create a truly powerful and user-friendly application.  It's a testament to the capabilities of Compose Multiplatform and a great source of inspiration for future projects. The open-source nature of the project also means you can contribute to its development and make it even better. The app supports multiple languages and is constantly being improved through community contributions, making it a truly global tool.  If you're a developer looking for a well-designed, efficient, and innovative application to learn from or a user needing a powerful note-taking tool, Notely Voice is a must-try.
